summary: A new 3d vision crosshair based on the one of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This game is amazing in 3d vision, but the crosshair was not on the right depth.
And the problem with the original Nvidia lasersight is that they are all red, ugly and HUGE.
So I have made a new one based on the original Skyrim crosshair. (Obviously, it is not animated)

To install this, just extract and copy the file nvstres.dll in your \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\NVIDIA Corporation\\3D Vision\" and replace the older one.
BUT PLEASE make a backup of the original one, just in case.

Then; go to the Nvidia control pannel->Set up Stereoscopic 3D->Change 3D laser sight and select the good one.
Then in game go to option and disable the crosshair, and press Ctrl+F12 to activate the 3dvision lasersight.

There you are !

For a better compatibility and a Sky fix, use this mod from Dorkirt : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=789#content

----------------------------------

MoicoM
author: MoicoM
